name: Beretta's Pamplemousse
description: We're always a bit wary of elderflower liqueur, but it doesn't take over in this supremely balanced and fresh-tasting gin cocktail, a signature brunch drink at Beretta in San Francisco.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 white grapefruit
1/2 ounce freshly squeezed juice from 1 lemon
1/2 ounce elderflower liqueur, such as St. Germain

recipeInstructions.text: Combine gin, grapefruit juice, lemon juice, and elderflower liqueur in a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Strain into cocktail glass, garnish with basil leaf, and serve immediately.
